programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma bomba é colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rápido do mundo e explodirá caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de você, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradáveis que indicam que algo está errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, há manchas em sua pele e ele tem visões que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da ficção.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 3, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: Mestre Wong e seus discípulos entram na 'Competição de Leão Dançante' para deter um plano de assassinato e enfrentar um oponente arrogante.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit, (1945, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

programme.title: Brief Encounter, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

programme.title: That Touch of Mink, (1962, Screwball)
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He’s enchanted by her small town ways, she’s captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: His Girl Friday, (1939, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

programme.title: Charade, (1963, Thriller)
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: Tower of London, (1962, Horror)
programme.desc: Vincent Price shines as Richard of Gloucester, the ambitious brother to a dying king. When he is overlooked to take the throne, he goes on a murderous rampage...only for the ghosts of those he has slain to return from the grave and haunt him!

programme.title: The Fall Of The House Of Usher, (1960, Horror)
programme.desc: When a beautiful young woman's suitor arrives to ask her hand in marriage, the doors of the mysterious house of Usher fling open...and terror begins.

programme.title: The Best Years of Our Lives, (1946, War)
programme.desc: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

programme.title: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying, (1967, Musical)
programme.desc: This hilarious musical stars Robert Morse as a charming and scheming window washer who climbs to the top of the corporate ladder by way of a self-help book.

programme.title: Killer's Kiss, (1955, Thriller)
programme.desc: This dazzling film noir from Stanley Kubrick is about a struggling New York boxer (Jamie Smith), whose life is imperiled when he protects a nightclub dancer (Irene Kane) from her gangster boss.

programme.title: Escape Plan 3: The Extractors, (2019, Action)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino completes the quest for revenge in KILL BILL; VOL. 1; as The Bride (Uma Thurman) crosses the final names off her death list.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: Night of the Sicario, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Natasha Henstridge (Species) stars in this action-packed thriller that will shock you at every turn. When DEA agents are ambushed by sicarios in a fatal shootout, the survivors must play a deadly game of cat and mouse to live through the night.

programme.title: Assault On Va-33, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery (The Boondock Saints) stars as Army Veteran Jason Hill. While on a VA hospital visit, terrorists infiltrate the building and take hostages. Hill is now outnumbered and the last line of defense against the armed insurgents.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Horror)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: The Ruins, (2008, Horror)
programme.desc: "The Ruins" follows a group of friends who become entangled in a struggle for survival after visiting a remote archaeological dig in the Mexican jungle where they discover something deadly living among the ruins.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Embryo
programme.desc: As Jun breaksdown and confess her struggles of being the Devil Lady, Lan Asuka appears once again to take Jun to a military compound.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Shark
programme.desc: Lan informs Jun that Aoi Kurosaki, Jun's old classmate, is possessor of Devil Beast Syndrome and may potentially be Jun's new ally.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Cat
programme.desc: Due to their similiar looks, Hitomi often loses out on her modeling opportunities to Jun. Despite this, Hitomi finds herself attracted to Jun, arising the suspicion that Hitomi may also be another Beast.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Fog
programme.desc: Experiencing her defeat at the hands of Airial, Jun ends up at a local hospital while a deep fog encircles the city. Dismayed by Jun's defeat, Lan commands her to battle the beast once more.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Enemy
programme.desc: Jun is introduced to Dr. Jason Bates who professes his interest in her, both as a woman and as Devil Lady.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Eyes
programme.desc: Jun can't shake off the feeling that she's being watched. All the while, Lan and HA team discover that curious string of murders have been occuring where the victims' eyes have been taken.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Flames
programme.desc: Four year old Remi is miraculously rescued from a fire. Suspecting her to be another Beast, Lan orders for the girl to be further evaluated.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Box
programme.desc: When four bodies are found inside an elevator of a department store in midst of a Christmas season, Jun is ordered by Lan to investigate the matter on a Christmas eve.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Faces
programme.desc: Jun wakes from a nightmare in which a Beast hunts one another. Puzzled by the cryptic dream Jun is haunted by the nightmare even while she's awake.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Moving to a new town is tough on kids. Nothing is familiar, and with no friends, it can be scary. In Satsuki's case, that last part isn't helped any when she, her little brother, and three kids from school end up in the old schoolhouse.
programme.sub-title: Amanojaku: Tonight, the Spirits Will be Resurrected!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Something is stinking up the town, and it isn't just urban reconstruction! A ghost has invaded the school's bathrooms, and it's up to Satsuki and the gang to find out how to put it back to sleep.
programme.sub-title: Akagami Aogami: A Hand Reaches Out from the Toilet...

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The big play is coming up, but the boy in the lead role is scared. He makes a wish for the gymnasium to catch fire--and it does. Then, when the play moves to being held in the old schoolhouse, the boy wishes to be injured--and he is!
programme.sub-title: The Curtain is Raised! The Cursed School Fine Arts Festival...

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: While in the old schoolhouse, Satsuki hears a haunting melody drifting through the halls. The only trouble is the lack of a pianist! It seems that if Satsuki hears the melody a total of four times, she'll die.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The gang helps Keiichiro train for a sports festival at school. A mysterious boy shows up at the track, running alongside Keiichiro. Despite the bonding between the two, it seems the new boy isn't quite alive.
programme.sub-title: Datto!!: The Blood-Soaked School Sports Festival

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Stories spread about something preying on children who are all alone, and the gang gets scared. Especially since their parents will be out for the night! A deadly ghost with a sickle in hand stalks Satsuki and her friends. Can the gang survive the night?
programme.sub-title: Night of Tragedy: The Demon Hand That Tears Through Doors

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: People all over town begin acting strangely, but it isn't their fault, as most of them have been replaced by mirror-world clones of themselves!
programme.sub-title: Utsushimi: The Soul Stolen by the Mirror!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Leo is convinced that there's a ghostly website out there on the internet, and is determined to find it. Unfortunately for him... he does!
programme.sub-title: The Ogre of the Underworld: The Circuits That Lead to Hell

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: There's a girl in Satsuki's class who is a little off. She tends to the rabbits at the school, whom she says are her only friends. But if that's weird, then it gets only stranger when a dead rabbit shows back up at the pen, alive and well.
programme.sub-title: Shirotabi: The Corpse That Wanders the Night

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Hajime has a close encounter with a spooky cab, which the rest of the gang doesn't believe. Even when they see it for themselves, it seems like a perfectly normal cab... that is, until the cab driver takes them to a life-draining tunnel!
programme.sub-title: Anamaneki: The Tunnel With No Exit

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The gang finds a strange doll in the trash. Satsuki prevents Keiichiro from bringing the doll home, but it shows up regardless. And then, late at night, Satsuki gets a phone call from none other than the doll herself!
programme.sub-title: The Shadows of Horror: The Talking Mary Doll

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: A strange nurse haunts Keiichiro, which triggers memories of the past. Not just for Satsuki and Keiichiro, who remember the death of their mother, but for Momoko as well, who happened to meet their mother just before she passed away.
programme.sub-title: A Mother's Feelings: The Nurse Who Announces Death

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: A ghostly painter with the ability to trap souls within his work has reawakened, and not even the other ghosts of the old schoolhouse want anything to do with him.
programme.sub-title: Da Vinci: The Picture That Swallows People

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Convinced that a ghost is haunting a train crossing, Leo takes the gang out to try and catch the spirit in a photo. When one of those photos shows a strange hand on Momoko's shoulder, things start getting bad, and a tale of revenge unfolds.
programme.sub-title: Railroad Crossing of Evil: The Ghost Photograph That Takes Lives

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Satsuki falls in with a bad crowd, or it might be better to say coven. Several girls at her school conspire to cast spells together, and she reluctantly joins in.
programme.sub-title: Ritual of Darkness: The Devil's Spell

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Following an accident on the job, Satsuki's father is injured, but Leo thinks ghosts are behind it.
programme.sub-title: Nest of Evil Spirits: The Public Housing Block That Consumes People!!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The gang takes a trip to the mountains to stay at a resort run by Satsuki's cousin Miyuki. However, upon arrival, a young girl tells them that Miyuki is dead. It seems that her ghost still haunts the frozen lake, turning it blood red.
programme.sub-title: The Snow Specter: The Horror of Bloodstained Lake!!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Satsuki is asked to perform the after school broadcast in the wake of the previous announcers having fallen ill under mysterious circumstances.
programme.sub-title: The Voice of the Dead: Akane of the Broadcast Room!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: A headless rider terrorizes the town on the anniversary of what was his death, seeking to decapitate people like himself. When the ghost turns his headlights upon Satsuki, the gang needs to find a way to put him to sleep again, and quick!
programme.sub-title: Curse of Death: The Headless Rider!!

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: The entire school is possessed and drawn into the old schoolhouse, all to lure Satsuki and the gang into a trap. Lord Ohma has awoken, and seeks vengeance upon Satsuki for her family's past attempts to seal him.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Beast
programme.desc: Jun Fudo is taken by a mysterious woman and finds herself being attacked by a werewolf-like creature. As she tries to save herself, she transforms into Devil Lady.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Blood
programme.desc: Jun tries to regain some sense of normalcy as she resumes her modeling career but finds herself yet again struggling to come to terms with her true identity.

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Wings

programme.title: Go Nagai's The Devil Lady: Embryo
programme.desc: As Jun breaksdown and confess her struggles of being the Devil Lady, Lan Asuka appears once again to take Jun to a military compound.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Top Five, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Written, directed and starring Chris Rock, TOP FIVE tells the story of New York City comedian-turned-film star Andre Allen, whose unexpected encounter with a journalist forces him to confront the comedy career—and the past—that he’s left behind.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Slaughter In San Francisco [English-Language Version], (1974, Action)

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: The Pallbearer, (1996, Romance)
programme.desc: Nothing like death to put some life into romance: a hapless 25-year-old's fortunes change when he is a pallbearer for someone he doesn't know. David Schwimmer, Gwyneth Paltrow.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: About Adam, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: When carefree Lucy (Kate Hudson) finally meets her perfect man, Adam (Stuart Townsend), she's ready to give up her wild ways and settle down for good. But while Lucy is busy making plans for her wedding, Adam is busy charming the rest of her family!

programme.title: Life Partners, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: At 29, the most long-term relationship Sasha (Leighton Meester) and Paige (Gillian Jacobs) have ever been in is with each other, using their co-dependent friendship as an excuse not to venture out into the dating world alone.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Side Effects, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: A woman turns to prescription medication as a way of handling her anxiety concerning her husband's upcoming release from prison.

programme.title: The Son of No One, (2011, Action)

programme.title: Haywire, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: A highly trained operative, is double crossed & left for dead by someone in her own agency. When things go haywire, she finds ways to turn the tables on her ruthless adversary.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Tom is a young man who believes it's better to be a fake somebody than a real nobody. Finally, A wealthy American shipbuilder hires Tom to travel to Italy to bring back his playboy son.

programme.title: Red Eye, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: Moments after takeoff, Lisa's seatmate, Jackson, menacingly reveals the real reason he's on board: He is an operative in a plot to kill a rich and powerful businessman .... And Lisa is the key to its success.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: The Pianist, (2002, Historical Drama)

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Barquero, (1970, Action)
programme.desc: When a small town on the Paria River is decimated by a group of vile outlaws, the bandits get more than they bargained for after the local bargeman turns the tables on the vicious gang! Lee van Cleef and Warren Oates star in this rousing western.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: The Giver, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the beloved young adult novel. A young man (Brenton Thwaites), who lives in a seemingly ideal world, must escape after discovering the deadly truths of his community’s secret past.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Divergent, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A thrilling action-adventure set in a future where Tris Prior (Shailene Woodley) uncovers a conspiracy by a faction leader (Kate Winslet) that will change society forever.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Tris and Four race to unlock the truth about the past in this star-powered, action-packed second adventure from the Divergent series.

programme.title: The Divergent Series The Allegiant, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Beyond the wall, Tris and Four face a threat more dangerous than they ever imagined, fighting for the future of an entire city in this action-packed third Divergent adventure.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: The Adventures of SharkBoy and Lavagirl, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From Robert Rodriguez, the director of the SPY KIDS franchise comes another superhero adventure for the entire family. This is the extraordinary tale of a girl with the force of a volcano who teams up with a boy raised by Great White sharks.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: Men in Black, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two top secret agents (Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones) are on a mission of policing alien activities on planet Earth. The Men in Black's current assignment: to stop an intergalactic terrorist from making Earth his next victim.

programme.title: Men in Black II, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Agents Jay and Kay are re-teamed against a sinister seductress who represents the toughest challenge yet to the MIB.

programme.title: Men in Black³, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Agent Jay travels back in time to 1969, where he teams up with a younger version of Agent Kay to stop an evil alien from destroying the future.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda, (2004, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: The film chronicles the true story of Paul Rusesabinga (Don Cheadle), a brave hotel manager who risked his life and those of his family to take in more than 1,000 refugees during the 1994 genocide of the Tutsus by Hutu militia.

programme.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein, (1994, Horror)
programme.desc: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

programme.title: I Think We're Alone Now, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The carefully crafted paradise of the last man on Earth is threatened by the arrival of a mysterious interloper.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmusch’s ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Terrifier, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Art The Clown sets his sights on three young women, along with anyone else that gets in his way.

programme.title: Diary of the Dead, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: While on location filming a horror movie, a group of college students finds themselves overrun by zombies, and ultimately end up capturing the epidemic on film.

programme.title: Surf Nazis Must Die!, (1987, Horror)
programme.desc: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: A thrilling horror film about a lawyer (Linney), who takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest (Wilkinson) who performed an exorcism on a young girl.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2, (2010, Horror)
programme.desc: As a couple welcome a newborn baby into their home, a demonic presence begins terrorizing them, tearing apart their perfect world and turning it into an inescapable nightmare.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Paranormal Activity 3 takes you back to where it all began, and the activity is more intense than ever. The cameras are on and recording the chilling moments when evil begins to terrorize young sisters Katie and Kristi for the first time.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 4, (2012, Horror)

programme.title: In exchange for healing his arms, Orochimaru offers to bring back to life Tsunade's younger brother Nawaki and Dan, her sweetheart.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: After a seemingly perfectly planned robbery goes awry, a group of criminals begin to suspect there is a traitor in the ranks, and back at their headquarters try to suss out the culprit.

programme.title: Pulp Fiction, (1994, Thriller)
programme.desc: Writer-director Quentin Tarantino delivers an iconic cast of characters in PULP FICTION, a wildly entertaining tale of violence and redemption. John Travolta, Samuel L. Jackson, Uma Thurman, and Bruce Willis star in this pop culture phenomenon.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Drama)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Mario Puzo's The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Director/screenwriter Francis Ford Coppola's definitive new edit and restoration of THE GODFATHER: PART III, with remastered picture and sound. Michael Corleone (Pacino) seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Touch, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Juvenal, whose touch can heal, is not what people expect a saint to be like, and when stories of his powers start to leak out, he finds himself keeping company with con men, fanatics, and hustlers of every persuasion in this sharply funny satire.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Killshot, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: An experienced hitman and his unhinged young partner target a blue-collar couple who have entered Witness Protection after witnessing an extortion scam gone wrong. Based on the novel by Elmore Leonard.

programme.title: Jackie Brown, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: A female flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)

programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.desc: At first, backup quarterback Jonathan is no football star. But when the starting quarterback is injured, he is thrown into the game but also in direct conflict with his coach and girlfriend.

programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: 3 Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon, (1976, Historical Drama)

programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime's fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KIZARU APPEARS! A TRAP TO CATCH TIGER!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen's mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SUDDEN TRAGEDY! A GUNSHOT SHUTS DOWN THE FUTURE!

programme.title: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO THE PRESENT! HORDY MAKES A MOVE!

programme.title: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KINGDOM IN SHOCK! AN ORDER TO EXECUTE NEPTUNE ISSUED!

programme.title: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy's uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out-of-body experience with hopes of saving his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A RIFT OPENS UP! LUFFY VS. JIMBEI!

programme.title: Jimbei and Luffy continue their standoff, the New Fish-Man pirates go on a rampage, and Hordy begins to experience startling side effects from his pill-popping habit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SOMETHING HAS HAPPENED TO HORDY! THE TRUE POWER OF THE EVIL DRUG!

programme.title: Hordy's rampant use of the energy steroid makes him bigger, stronger, and scarier than ever before! The Fish-Man princes join the battle, but even they may not be strong enough to stop Hordy's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! AT CONCHCORDE PLAZA!

programme.title: Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING CONFESSION! THE TRUTH BEHIND THE ASSASSINATION OF OTOHIME!

programme.title: Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother's murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHIRAHOSHI'S TEARS! LUFFY FINALLY SHOWS UP!

programme.title: Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BIG CLASH! THE STRAW HATS VS. A HUNDRED THOUSAND ENEMIES!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang show off how much stronger they've become by issuing a brutal beat down to Hordy and his ferocious Fish-Man Pirates! Can anything stop the Hats?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY ATTACKS ONE AFTER ANOTHER! ZORO AND SANJI JOIN THE BATTLE!

programme.title: Hordy's men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNVEILED! THE SECRET WEAPONS OF THE SUNNY!

programme.title: Franky dazzles Usopp and Chopper by transforming into a gigantic fighting robot, Hordy tries to blackmail the Kraken, and Luffy introduces his fist to the Fish-man's face!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IRON PIRATE! HERE COMES GENERAL FRANKY!

programme.title: Luffy shows off even more new powers as he brutally pummels Hordy, but the main attraction proves to be an ancient and immense pirate ship that's heading straight for Fish-Man Island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NOAH CLOSING IN! THE FISHMAN ISLAND FACING DESTRUCTION!

programme.title: Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy's devious nature fully comes to the surface.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY UP, LUFFY! SHIRAHOSHI'S LIFE IN JEOPARDY!

programme.title: Luffy sets the stage for a final battle with Hordy, Sanji kicks a giant in defense of Nami's honor, and Zoro puts his blades to the ultimate test against a steroid-powered fighting fish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FIERCE FIGHT BEGINS! LUFFY VS. HORDY!

programme.title: While Luffy and Shirahoshi try to prevent Fish-Man Island from being crushed, the rest of the Straw Hats square off against the meanest Fish-Man Pirates in the deep blue sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MASSIVE CONFUSED FIGHT! THE STRAW HATS VS. THE NEW FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: Luffy is the only one who can stop Hordy, but he'll need air to survive the fight, so Shirahoshi's big brother risks his own life in a heroic attempt to get Luffy a bigger bubble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY LOSES THE FIGHT?! HORDY'S LONG-AWAITED REVENGE!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats continue to fight bravely, Luffy tries to find a way to save the island, and the horrible truth about Hordy's hatred for humans is finally revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SHOCKING FACT! THE TRUE IDENTITY OF HORDY!

programme.title: Hordy's twisted past takes center stage in a Fish-Man flashback. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi's brother begs Luffy to save his beloved homeland and wipe out the anti-human element!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO ZERO! EARNEST WISHES FOR LUFFY!

programme.title: Luffy's fist of fire puts Hordy down for the count, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of the remaining Fish-Man Pirates. Meanwhile, a very big boat looms overhead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S ALL-OUT ATTACK! RED HAWK BLASTS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats try to make short work of their enemies, Luffy summons the strength for one last brutal attack on Hordy. Now, about that giant boat…
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COMING TO AN END! THE FINAL DECISIVE BATTLE AGAINST HORDY!

programme.title: After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fish-Man Island was saved by the timely arrival of the Sea Kings, but all is not well. Luffy lost a lot of blood in his battle with Hordy, and fish-to-human transfusions are strictly forbidden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE FUTURE! THE PATH TO THE SUN!

programme.title: Jimbei must decide whether or not to join the Straw Hats, and the grateful citizens of Fish-Man Island host a fabulous banquet in honor of their human heroes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET REVEALED! THE TRUTH ABOUT THE ANCIENT WEAPON!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew learn of epic battle between Aokiji and Akainu, a forgotten foe tries to kidnap the mermaid princess, and Hordy's gang finally gets what's coming to them!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS STUNNED! THE NEW FLEET ADMIRAL OF THE NAVY!

programme.title: When Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji stumble upon a couple of Big Mam's henchmen extorting sweets from the peaceful people of Fish-Man Island, the Straw Hats make a new – and very powerful – enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHE LOVES SWEETS! BIG MOM OF THE FOUR EMPERORS!

programme.title: The Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MANY PROBLEMS LIE AHEAD! A TRAP AWAITING IN THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew bid farewell to their new friends before setting off in search of the greatest adventures the New World has to offer!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FINALLY TIME TO GO! GOODBYE, FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth… and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Underworld Awakening, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: As the war between the Death Dealers and the Lycans rages on, Selene (Beckinsale), the vampire warrior, and Michael (Speedman), the werewolf hybrid, work together in an effort to unlock the secrets of their respective bloodlines.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Archie (Gregory Peck) and his partner, Billy (Desi Arnaz, Jr.) are bandits by trade, staging daring robberies throughout the American frontier. But when their latest heist takes a deadly turn, they are pursued by a ruthless marshal (Jack Warden).

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunslinger is forced to strap on his six-shooters once again by the vengeful brothers of a man he killed in self-defense.

programme.title: Lonesome Dove, (1989, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: Texas Rangers and long-time ranching partners Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call meet their old friend Jake, and decide to strike out from their south Texas base and drive a cattle herd to Montana.

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: The Guilt Trip, (2012, Screwball)
programme.desc: "Barbra Streisand and Seth Rogen are the perfect comedy duo"* as they embark on one mother of a road trip! When Andy invites his mom on an 8-day, 3,000-mile journey across the country, the farther they go, the closer they get. *Jake Hamilton, FOX-TV

programme.title: Road Trip, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.

programme.title: Eurotrip, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Europe will never be the same again after Scotty Thomas and his buddies take off for the express to excess! They're hooking up with hot strangers and jamming all the extreme insanity they can into the wildest trip of their lives!

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Identity, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: What if every choice we ever make was already made for us? What if there really were no coincidences in life and our destinies were already predetermined? Ten strangers with secrets are brought together in a savage rainstorm. Rated: R

programme.title: Skinwalkers, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

programme.title: The Poughkeepsie Tapes, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: When hundreds of videotapes showing torture, murder, and dismemberment are found in an abandoned house, they reveal a serial killer's decade-long reign of terror and become the most disturbing collection of evidence homicide detectives have ever seen.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a young, middle-class couple moves into what seems like a typical suburban house, they become increasingly disturbed by a presence that may or may not be demonic and active at night.

programme.title: When the group learns that someone dangerous may be loose near the farm, Rick, Shane, Daryl and Glenn try to keep everyone safe; Shane's antagonism grows and Carl faces the consequences of his actions.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and Carl find the farm in jeopardy; the group is split up in the chaos; Rick's leadership is questioned.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: As the world grows more dangerous and Lori's pregnancy advances, Rick locates a potentially safe haven.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A medical emergency proves traumatic and leaves a life hanging in the balance; Rick and the group discover a potential threat to their new surroundings.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Andrea and Michonne witness an accident that leads them to a new group of survivors, but when tensions arise with their new acquaintances, they must make a decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group becomes severed, putting lives in jeopardy; in Woodbury, Merle approaches the Governor to make a request.
